channel.description: Recent content in Handbook on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Navigate changes
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Technology comes in waves. You’ve likely noticed this cycle. AI is the current big shift, but before that, we adapted to DevOps, mobile, and the cloud.

item.title: Making a career
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Look, the tech industry’s relationship with employee tenure is… weird. A year here, a year there. It’s often treated like collecting stamps.

item.title: Dwarves as a community
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We run Dwarves as an open company/community. Dwarves Community is melting pot for software engineers, thinkers, learners and techies who are to explore, learn and master the latest advancements in technology.

item.title: Compliance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our approach to compliance At Dwarves Foundation, we’re committed to upholding the highest ethical standards and complying with all laws and regulations.

item.title: MMA
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Why MMA? We believe in measuring what truly matters. At Dwarves, we don’t track hours or count lines of code.

item.title: Hybrid Working
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves Foundation, we believe in giving you the freedom to work where you’re most productive. While we’re primarily a remote-first company, we recognize the value of in-person collaboration.

item.title: Work routine
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As mentioned in how we work, we keep our teams small and embrace agile principles at scale. This approach helps us stay nimble while delivering consistent quality.

item.title: Ventures arm
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: These policies have been part of our approach since our early days. If you joined after 2018, this section will help you understand an important part of how we operate beyond client services.

item.title: Our purpose
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We serve a single purpose: To empower innovations and co-create the next big things. Driven by purpose Our journey begins with purpose.

item.title: Benefits & perks
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Since most Dwarves Foundation employees work in Saigon, this section is written with that as the default. Some benefits don’t make sense in other countries.

item.title: Getting started
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What to expect Welcome aboard! Starting at Dwarves Foundation mixes excitement with challenges. You’re learning a new job, meeting new colleagues, and adapting to our remote culture, all at once.

item.title: How we hire
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Why we hire the way we do Hiring at Dwarves means we need help, but not just any help, we need the right help.

item.title: How we spend money
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We do the business to provide engineering capabilities to help customers on their business. A part of the benefits package is the Stock Option Plan, and the money is the sensitive topic in most companies, but we want you to understand so you could commit your best to make Dwarves Foundation a right place to work.

item.title: Moonlighting
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Balancing outside work Moonlighting means working on professional, paid jobs outside your work at Dwarves Foundation. We recognize this isn’t a black-and-white topic.

item.title: Places to work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Noise Levels If you’re doing creative work, research suggests you’ll want to be surrounded by ambient noise. A café or co-working space is the perfect choice in this case.

item.title: Security rules
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Basic Security Keeping laptops and phones secure is vitally important. We’re a software company and many of us have access to secure systems (both our own and our customers).

item.title: Tools and systems
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Public-facing channel Website Foundation: dwarves.foundation Ventures: dwarves.ventures Careers: dwarves.careers Memo: memo.d.foundation Social Network Discord: <> Facebook: fb/dwarvesf Twitter: @dwarvesf Instagram: https://instagram.

item.title: What we stand for
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Empower Innovation with Software Craftsmanship Innovation happens constantly. Every day, startups form and secure funding to pursue their visions, striving to create positive change, impact millions of lives, achieve breakthroughs, and build foundations for economic growth.

item.title: What we value
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Values come first. They guide our decisions, shape our culture, and define who we are as a company. They’re what we’re proud of and what helps us navigate difficult choices.

item.title: Where we work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Office The Dwarves HQ is in Saigon, Vietnam. Fifty-ish people and two cats have desk space in the Saigon office, but those people also work from home regularly.

item.title: Who does what
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Knowing who to bring a question or issue to should be straightforward. Most things fall within the focus of a specific group or “chair” at Dwarves Foundation.

item.title: You are Dwarves Foundation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: You are our voice When you join Dwarves Foundation, you become our voice to the world. Every interaction matters. When Quang responds to a support request, he isn’t just Quang, he is Dwarves Foundation.

item.title: FAQ
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Frequently Asked Questions Here are answers to common questions about working at Dwarves Foundation. If you don’t find what you’re looking for, please reach out to us directly.

item.title: How we work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our approach to work Before joining us, you likely discovered a bit about how we operate as a team. This section expands on that foundation, highlighting the key aspects of our work philosophy without repeating information available elsewhere.
